Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Based on its unique physical and biological characteristics we can conclude that thuricin 439 is a novel bacteriocin.
Sequence Information.Comments: The two active peptides are likely to be encoded by a single gene, whose product may undergo one or more post translational modifications that result in two active products of different molecular masses.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterisation of a novel bacteriocin produced by Bacillus thuringiensis strain B439.
Literature.Author: Ahern M, Verschueren S, van Sinderen D.
